message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $9,500. This is a high-quality item that I believe would greatly benefit you, given its value to you is estimated at $10,000. I look forward to your response.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm happy to pay $8,500 for it. Let me know if you're willing to work with me on that price.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to counter with an offer of $9,000 for the product. I hope this aligns more closely with what you're looking for.
